periodic Module Reference

Functions/Subroutines

subroutine ghostp
 dummy routine, calls get_ghost_p below
subroutine get_ghost_p (i, ginfront, gbehind)
 set the ghost particles, essentially these are the positions of the particles infront/behind, if they are at the other side of the box due to periodic b.c. this position must be adjusted
subroutine enforce_periodic ()
 if a point/particle leaves one side of the box, reinsert it on the opposite side

Detailed Description
